table.name: vtiger_troubletickets
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_troubletickets` ( `ticketid` int(19) NOT NULL, `ticket_no` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `groupname` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `parent_id` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `product_id` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `priority` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `severity` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `category` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `solution` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `update_log` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `version_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `hours` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `days` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `contact_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ticketid`), KEY `troubletickets_ticketid_idx` (`ticketid`), KEY `troubletickets_status_idx` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: vtiger_ticketcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ticketcf` ( `ticketid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `from_portal` varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `cf_755` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_757` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_759` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_761` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_763` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_765` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_767` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_769` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_771` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_773` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_775` decimal(24,3) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_777` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_779` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_781` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_783` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_785` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_787` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_789` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_791` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_793` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_795` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_797` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_799` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_801` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_803` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_805` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_807` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_809` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_811` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_813` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_815` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_817` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_819` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_821` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_823` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_825` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_827` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_829` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_831` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_833` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_835` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_845` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_847` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_849` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_851` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_853` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_855` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_857` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_859` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_861` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_863` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_865` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_867` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_869` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_871` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_873` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_875` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_877` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_879` time DEFAULT NULL, `cf_881` time DEFAULT NULL, `cf_883` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_885` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_887` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_889` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_891` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_893` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_895` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_897` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_899` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_901` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_903` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_905` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_907` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_909` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_911` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_913` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_915` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_917` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_919` date DEFAULT NULL, `cf_921` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_923` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `cf_925` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `cf_927` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ticketid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

field.helpinfo: This gives the estimated hours for the Ticket.<br>When the same ticket is added to a Service Contract,based on the Tracking Unit of the Service Contract,Used units is updated whenever a ticket is Closed.

This gives the estimated days for the Ticket.<br>When the same ticket is added to a Service Contract,based on the Tracking Unit of the Service Contract,Used units is updated whenever a ticket is Closed.

field.fieldlabel: Scrap Or Part Salvage Done BY
